wikipedia_page.main: Toby John Cruse (born 16 October 1980) is a British live agent, talent manager, concert promoter, theatre producer, entrepreneur and professional musician. He is founder and CEO of Worldwide Entertainment, incorporating Worldwide Talent, Worldwide Live and Manhattan Music. He also works as a celebrity booking agent.

response: The band included Ronnie Johnson (guitar), Elliot Henshaw (drums), Rob Taggart (keyboards) and Dave Troke (bass), under the consultancy of Toby Cruse.

The artists included Louis Hoover himself with The Hollywood Orchestra and Melissa Tham; the musical director was Toby Cruse; and the UK musicians were again Toby Cruse (piano/keyboards), Elliot Henshaw (drums), David Olney (bass), Robert Sydor (tenor sax/flute/clarinet) and Tony Dixon (lead trumpet).
